title: Admin Tools & Configuration
description: Learn how to configure and manage the CivicFlow2 system

steps.title: Admin Dashboard
steps.description: Welcome to the admin dashboard. This is your control center for managing users, configuring settings, and monitoring system health.

steps.title: System Health Monitoring
steps.description: Monitor the health of all system components including database, cache, AI services, and integrations. Green indicators mean everything is running smoothly.

steps.title: User Management
steps.description: Create, edit, and manage user accounts. Assign roles (Applicant, Reviewer, Approver, Admin) and control access permissions for each user.

steps.title: Role-Based Access Control
steps.description: Configure what each role can access and modify. This ensures users only see features relevant to their responsibilities while maintaining security.

steps.title: Integration Configuration
steps.description: Configure external integrations including Microsoft Teams, email notifications, and AI services. Test connections and view integration health status.

steps.title: Microsoft Teams Integration
steps.description: Set up Teams notifications for application events. Configure which channels receive notifications and customize adaptive card templates.

steps.title: Demo Mode Configuration
steps.description: Customize demo mode settings including simulation speed, data generation, and feature toggles. Perfect for tailoring demos to specific audiences.

steps.title: Audit Trail & Compliance
steps.description: View comprehensive audit logs showing all system actions. Filter by user, action type, or date range. Export logs for compliance reporting.

steps.title: Analytics & Reporting
steps.description: Access detailed analytics about system usage, application trends, and performance metrics. Generate custom reports and schedule automated exports.

steps.title: Backup & Recovery
steps.description: Configure automated backups and test recovery procedures. View backup history and restore points to ensure data protection.

steps.title: Admin Tools Tour Complete!
steps.description: You now have a comprehensive understanding of CivicFlow2's admin capabilities. You're ready to configure and manage the system effectively.
